channel.title: How to install XP on a Vista system?
channel.description:
Hey guys anyone remember me?
I have a HP laptop thats pre-installed with Vista and I want to get the loving XP back On google all I found is how to dual-boot not overwrite. And please let me know of any problems I can have like with my drivers or anything. Thanks.

Some people don’t like vista, as it uses more memory/etc then XP does. There are more reasons.

item.title: How to install XP on a Vista system?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Delete the partition and create a new one and install xp onto it. You can do this all with the xp cd.

And wuduppppppp you haven’t been here in a long time.

Read full topic
